Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Made a plane. Don't normally do military, but I got carried away.

Flies very high and fast.

Six dumb missiles, 20 (slightly wonky) minibombs and 2 heavier bombs.

Not quite sure what it's for. The flight profile is more of a 70s/80s Interceptor, the weaponry is more ground support. Long range ground support?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zzp162nfdpfblmn/B9%20Interceptor%20NMJ.craft

2 Engines

3-8 Bombs

Staging (twice for each pair) fires the missiles in pairs,

Edited June 25, 2014 by Fellow314
